title: DeepaData EDM v0.3 — Gravity Fragment
description: Defines resonance, weighting, and emotional decay parameters governing recall priority, tethering, and reentry likelihood. Fragment is non-normative; canonical definition is in schema/edm.v0.3.schema.json.

viscosity.description: How long emotional charge persists over time.

gravity_type.description: Nature of the gravitational pull influencing recall.

tether_type.description: What the memory is anchored to.

tether_target.description: Specific name or reference target (Title Case allowed).

recall_triggers.description: Sensory or symbolic cues that reawaken recall.

retrieval_keys.description: Compact hooks for indexing and search retrieval (3–8 recommended).

nearby_themes.description: Adjacent thematic associations to expand recall radius.

legacy_embed.description: Indicates whether this memory is intended for long-term or posthumous embedding.

reentry_score.description: Likelihood of resurfacing during future recall cycles (0–1).

entry_strength.description: Initial impact strength of memory imprint (0–1).

temporal_decay.description: Rate of emotional fade or persistence.

resilience_markers.description: Signals of adaptation or emotional stability derived from recall context.

compliance_mask.description: Data sharing/export restrictions derived from governance.
